i_country.question: Country where TTC will take place

i_teaching_start_month.question: Date you began teaching the Art of Living / Yesplus Course (month/year)

i_taught_count_newformat.question: Art of Living Course/ Yesplus Course (new 5-day format)

i_taught_count_oldformat.question: Art of Living Course/ Yesplus Course (old format)

i_volunteer_years_known.question: For how many years have you known the applicant as a volunteer?

i_volunteer_service_activities.question: What service activities (courses/events/ongoing projects) do you know the participant to have participated in locally/regionally/nationally?

i_volunteer_work_with_teacher_question.question: Please select the option that most closely describes how the applicant has worked with you directly

i_volunteer_work_with_teacher_org_newfor.display_value: Organized new format 5-day Art of Living Course (Part1) or Yesplus Course

i_volunteer_work_with_teacher_ass_newfor.display_value: Assisted new format 5-day Art of Living Course (Part1) or Yesplus Course

i_volunteer_work_with_teacher_org_oldfor.display_value: Organized or assisted old format Art of Living Course or Yesplus Course

i_volunteer_work_with_teacher_service_pr.display_value: Worked on other service projects with you

i_volunteer_indepth_conversation.question: Have you had an in-depth conversation with the applicant to understand their readines for the TTC and their compliance with the TTC requirements

i_volunteer_not_satisfy_requirements_rea.question: If you have responded 'No' to the above question, please explain which requirements are missing.

i_volunteer_satisfy_requirements.question: Based on the conversation, can you confirm that the applicant satisfies ALL the TTC requirements? If you are unsure, please verify with the applicant before responding.

i_volunteer_physical_fitness.question: Please comment on the applicant's ability to physically handle the rigors of a 2 week intensive TTC program

i_volunteer_mental_fitness.question: Please comment on the applicants overall mental fitness, emotional stability and any other relevant behavioral issues you may have noticed

i_volunteer_vegetarian.question: Please comment on whether the applicant is 100% vegetarian, and free from use of alcohol, tobacco and recreational drugs for at least 6 months.

i_volunteer_connection_to_Guruji.question: Please comment on the applicant's connection to Guruji.

i_volunteer_represent_aol.question: Please comment on whether the applicant is suitable and capable of representing the Art of Living Foundation as a teacher

i_courses_org_for_teacher.question: How many courses has the applicant organized for you?

i_volunteer_lead_org.question: Were they a lead organizer on at least one of these courses?

i_lead_org_work_question.question: Pick one course that the applicant lead organized for you, where they took the most ownership for the course. Please specify the responsibilities they took

i_lead_org_work_listing.display_value: Listing the course on online registration portal

i_lead_org_work_leadteam.display_value: Bringing a team of volunteers together and leading them.

i_lead_org_work_personal_enrollment.display_value: Enrolling participants for the course personally

i_lead_org_work_day2day_logistics.display_value: Setting up the room and the day-to-day logistics of the course

i_lead_org_work_ownership.display_value: Taking complete ownership of the course without the need for follow-up

i_lead_org_work_accounting.display_value: Completing the accounting for the course within two weeks from the end of the course

i_lead_org_introtalks_led.question: Please comment on the total number of introductory talks/info session that the applicant LED ON THEIR OWN for this course, number of people in attendence per session on an average, and number of people who registered for the course from the sessions?

i_lead_org_personal_enrollment_count.question: How many people did the applicant personally enroll for the course?

i_lead_org_course_participant_count.question: How many total number of participants were there on the course?

i_lead_org_leadership_skills.question: Please comment on their overall organizing/team-building/leadership skills, giving 2-3 specific examples

i_volunteer_assist.question: Did the applicant 'assist' you on a course that you taught? 'Assist' means that they sat through the entire course and led Yoga/Pranayams/some basic knowledge point/processes/games, under your guidance.

i_assist_participant_count.question: How many total number of participants on the course?

i_assist_processes.question: Please provide details of the knowledge points/processes/games that the applicant led during the course,commenting on their ability to deliver it in a clear, crisp, interactive style.

i_volunteer_rating_leadership_speaks_up.question: Speaks up if they think something can be changed or done better

i_volunteer_rating_leadership_respectful.question: Has a respectful demeanour towards all

i_volunteer_rating_leadership_explanatio.question: If you gave them a score 2 or less for any of the categories, please give details on why you gave a low score

i_volunteer_rating_communication_spoken_.question: Fluency in spoken English - grammar, sentence formation, clarity of speech

i_volunteer_rating_communication_confide.question: Ability to speak confidently in front of a group of 10+ people

i_volunteer_rating_communication_connect.question: Ability to connect with the group they are speaking to

i_volunteer_rating_communication_awarene.question: General awareness/sensitivity to audience they are speaking to

i_volunteer_rating_communication_explana.question: If you gave them a score 2 or less for any of the categories, please give details on why you gave a low score

i_volunteer_rating_org_skills_stretch.question: Willingness to stretch beyond their comfort zone

i_volunteer_rating_org_skills_explanatio.question: If you gave them a score 2 or less for any of the categories, please give details on why you gave a low score

i_volunteer_rating_retention_skills_conn.question: Connecting with participants during a course

i_volunteer_rating_retention_skills_atte.question: Attending follow-ups, reunion & satsangs after the course

i_volunteer_rating_retention_skills_kit.question: Keeping in touch with participants individually

i_volunteer_rating_retention_skills_insp.question: Inspiring participants to take the next steps

i_volunteer_rating_retention_skills_buil.question: Building volunteer teams to work on courses/service projects

i_volunteer_rating_retention_skills_expl.question: If you gave them a score 2 or less for any of the categories, please give details on why you gave a low score

i_volunteer_strengths.question: Please specify 3 strengths of the applicant with examples

i_volunteer_improvements.question: Please specify 3 areas of improvement for the applicant with examples

i_volunteer_suited_teaching_question.question: Courses this applicant is most suited to teach

i_volunteer_teaching_readiness.question: Based on your assessment at this time, please rate the readiness of this applicant to start leading courses right away after they graduate form the TTC

display_values.3: May be ready in the future

i_volunteer_areas_suggestions.question: After the applicant comes back from TTC, please let us know which geographic areas would you like to see him/her teach and develop? Please also let us know If you prefer that they teach and help grow the existing center. Your inputs in this will greatly help us guide them.

i_completed_ttc_mentorship_training.question: Have you completed the TTC mentorship training?

i_want_ttc_mentorship_training.question: If not would you like to be a TTC mentor teacher? (It involves a short mentorship training, after which you would be matched with TTC graduates that could benefit from your strengths as a mentor.)

i_misc_comments.question: Do you have any other comments for TTC desk?
